alert.note: Alert for Palo Duro Canyon (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued August 17 at 1:28PM CDT until August 17 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING PALO DURO CANYON... ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TO 8 PM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Heat Advisory Thursday, temperatures up to 106 expected in Palo Duro Canyon. For the Heat Advisory Friday, temperatures up to 108 expected in Palo Duro Canyon * WHERE...Palo Duro Canyon. * WHEN...For the first Heat Advisory, until 8 PM CDT this evening. For the second Heat Advisory, from 2 PM to 8 PM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke.
